title: No Place to Hide
html:
No Place to Hide

Metadata

  • Author: Glenn Greenwald

  • ASIN: B00E0CZX0G

  • ISBN: 1250062586

  • Reference: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00E0CZX0G

  • Kindle link

Highlights

A former administration official who worked with the NSA chief told Harris that “Alexander’s strategy” was clear: “I need to get all of the data.” And, Harris added, “He wants to hang on to it for as long as he can.” — location: 1650 ^ref-14765

The Tailored Access Operations (TAO) division responsible for this work is, in effect, the agency’s own private hacker — location: 1851 ^ref-47445
